text: Cedar Point is an amusement park in Sandusky, Ohio, United States. It opened in 1870. It is the second-oldest operating amusement park in the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * 2014 park map * Cedar Point at the Roller Coaster DataBase * * Cedar Point Brochures & Park Guides Category:Theme parks in the United States Category:1870 establishments in Ohio
title: Cedar Point
